name: Deer Calls & Deer Sounds for Deer Hunting -- (ad free) BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
name_original: Deer Calls & Deer Sounds for Deer Hunting -- (ad free) BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
description:
Deer calls and deer hunting calls with deer sounds perfect for deer hunting. Bluetooth compatible! The DeerPro deer call app provides you REAL deer calls at your fingertips. These deer calls are clear and crisp. 6 unique deer sounds included. This is the best deer calls app you will find. Connect the app to your speaker and amplifier system to play the deer calls loud and use the deer calls to bring in deer.

FEATURES:
- 6 deer hunting calls including REAL deer sounds and REAL deer sounds
- Effective, realistic and clear deer calls
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker to play the deer calls
- Deer hunting calls can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the deer calls
- The soundtracks allow you to set the deer calls and focus on deer hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for deer calls at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple deer hunting sounds and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in "DeerPro"
- Buck Grunt - Deer Call
- Antler Rattle - Deer Call
- Doe Grunt - Deer Call
- Doe Bleat - Deer Call
- Lost Fawn - Deer Call


Download DeerPro deer calls and start having deer hunting success today!
